values:
Okay, here's the deal. I have a few new chapters ready to go for the novel, but after discussing it with some people who have had things published, I think I'm going to hold off on posting them. Basically, I hope to get this book published someday and if all the chapters are available online I can't do that.

Enjoy the five chapters already here. I'll finish the book off soon and try to get it on the shelves (or at the very least, on Amazon).
CHAPTERS UPDATED WEEKLY CHAPTER ONE COMING SOON
